subject_terms_1:This is a pencil drawing featuring a small living space. In the drawing
 there are two tables
 one on the left and one in the center-right. The right table has two stands sitting on top of it on either end. The walls of the space seems to be made of wood panels. The title is written on the bottom-right
 above the signature and date. The edges of the paper are quite torn and folded
 especially on the right corners. The right edge of the drawing is stained and dotted. prisoners of war prison camps

metadata.title_text: "Pencil drawing of ""The Little House The Little House, Changi Prison Camp
metadata.subject_terms_1: This is a pencil drawing featuring a small living space. In the drawing, there are two tables, one on the left and one in the center-right. The right table has two stands sitting on top of it on either end. The walls of the space seems to be made of wood panels. The title is written on the bottom-right, above the signature and date. The edges of the paper are quite torn and folded, especially on the right corners. The right edge of the drawing is stained and dotted. prisoners of war prison camps
metadata.subject_terms_2: world wars Prisoners of war Drawing Prisoner-of-war camps
metadata.context_8: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
